attributes.action: instruct the Home Office, or other appropriate authority, to charge lawyers with perverting the course of justice when they use obscure loopholes to get motorists off speeding, etc., charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is one lawyer, in particular, who frequently appears in the papers as having acted in this way for celebrity clients.  I feel, strongly, that if someone has committed an offence, especially one which may cause INJURY OR DEATH to an innocent victim, it is totally wrong for this person to pay a lawyer to exploit a loophole in the law in order to escape punishment for this.  (There should, of course, BE no such loopholes but that's for another petition).
